text: Andrewsianthus is a genus of liverwort in the family Scapaniaceae. Species include:Andrewsianthus. Atlas of Living Australia.Andrewsianthus. The Plant List. *Andrewsianthus aberrans *Andrewsianthus australis * Andrewsianthus bidens *Andrewsianthus bilobus *Andrewsianthus cavifolius * Andrewsianthus cuspidatus * Andrewsianthus ferrugineus Grolle *Andrewsianthus hodgsoniae *Andrewsianthus jamesonii *Andrewsianthus kilimanjaricus *Andrewsianthus koponenii * Andrewsianthus perigonialis * Andrewsianthus puniceus *Andrewsianthus scabrellus *Andrewsianthus sphenoloboides *Andrewsianthus squarrosus ==References== Category:Jungermanniales genera Category:Scapaniaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
